title: Warby Parker Eyewear branding
content:
Hi, I'm interested in both the upper case title and lowercase 'eyewear'. Any suggestions please!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140916034105im_/http:/typophile.com/files/HighTide-1_4905.jpg)
author: RBM

comments.content:
WARBY PARKER: can't find a perfect match and even with a [better sample](http://web.archive.org/web/20140916034105/http:/myfonts-wtf.s3.amazonaws.com/33/3315c6e0d665d87a66154cc7c66758bf.33234.png); it's something close to [Gotham](http://web.archive.org/web/20140916034105/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/gotham/overview)/ [Proxima Nova](http://web.archive.org/web/20140916034105/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/marksimonson/proxima-nova) (used on their website)/ [Neutraface No.2](http://web.archive.org/web/20140916034105/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/neutraface2) ( [Neutraface](http://web.archive.org/web/20140916034105/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/neutraface) used in shops) but slightly rounded; I'm aware of [Gotham Rounded](http://web.archive.org/web/20140916034105/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/gotham-rounded/overview) and [Proxima Nova Soft](http://web.archive.org/web/20140916034105/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/marksimonson/proxima-nova-soft) but they don't match either... More alternatives: [Arquitecta](http://web.archive.org/web/20140916034105/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/latinotype/arquitecta), [Celias](http://web.archive.org/web/20140916034105/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typedynamic/celias)  
eyewear: sorry but really too small for my eyes... I know they're using [Utopia](http://web.archive.org/web/20140916034105/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/utopia) Display (and Proxima Nova) on their website. At this size, it could the job even if I'm quite convinced it's not the right one.
Sweet. Thanks for your help, as usual.
